DatabaseSetup.CreateDatabaseQuery: CREATE TABLE email_queue (Id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,ReceiverName VARCHAR(255),ReceiverAddress VARCHAR(255),Content TEXT,Subject VARCHAR(255), IsProcessed BOOLEAN DEFAULT false, IsSuccessful BOOLEAN DEFAULT NULL, CreatedAt DATE DEFAULT current_date)
DatabaseSetup.CheckDatabaseExistanceQuery: SELECT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_schema = 'public' AND table_name = 'email_queue') AS table_exists
